name: Experts Exchange 2011 / Show Answers & Remove Shit
description:
Cleans up the page. And shows the real answers detected by your Search Engine...
They're a bunch of scammers. Use this and don't pay a dime.

Feel free to copy it.
Have fun.  :)
additional_info:
